Alha-Udal

Paramardi was the last great king of the Chandela dynasty. In 1182 CE, Prithviraj Chauhan attacked Mahoba (Battle of Mahoba). In this battle, two famous commanders of Paramardi, Alha and Udal, showed incredible valor and attained martyrdom. Their bravery is still sung in the folk songs (Alha-Khand) of Bundelkhand.

ЁЯУЙ
Invasion by Qutb al-Din Aibak

In 1203 CE, Qutb al-Din Aibak invaded Kalinjar and defeated Paramardi. With this, the independent Chandela power came to an end.
